main.description: Resolves one or more AT-URIs to their underlying records via the appropriate PDS. Accepts either a single `uri` parameter for backwards compatibility, or one or more `uris` parameters for batch resolution.

uri.description: Deprecated: prefer `uris` for all resolutions. Retained for backwards compatibility. Returns the record object directly rather than a wrapped array.

uris.description: One or more AT-URIs to resolve in batch. Returns an ordered array of record objects, with an empty object in place of any failed resolutions.

errors.name: InvalidAtUri
errors.description: One or more of the provided AT-URIs could not be parsed.

errors.name: HandleResolutionFailed
errors.description: A handle in the provided AT-URI could not be resolved to a DID.

errors.name: DidResolutionFailed
errors.description: The DID could not be resolved to a DID document.

errors.name: NoPdsEndpoint
errors.description: The resolved DID document contained no valid AtprotoPersonalDataServer service endpoint.

record.description: A resolved AT-URI record, matching the shape of com.atproto.repo.getRecord output.

singleResult.description: Deprecated: returned when resolving via the legacy `uri` parameter.
